• mildly febrile

• white count 860,000
• thrombocytopenia
chemotherapy
multiple enhancing masses involving both cerebral hemispheres and the brain stem.
t-cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia (all)
• cerebral abscesses
• metastatic disease
• cerebral infarction
2 year old boy presents with a rapid decline in mental status
